item.description:
I've been racking my brain for 2 days trying to think of where to go on Saturday!

Originally I wanted to just get on the pike and fall into a blissful ride on smooth roads and suck the tank dry before stopping.. then take the long way home - carve.

Jim pointed out how the pace was nice last weekend, rather than sheer miles, it was rich with the enviroment that we rode in. Coming back up on 169 in RI. So I thought, where is the farthest place we can go that's in our back yard? Worcester! Let's GO!

I figure we will see if it looks interesting or scary or sick or all three and eventually head toward the Amherst area, did someone say popovers? hmm

Hope to see everyone on the pike at 9AM!

Paul
item.name: We're going to Worcester!
